channel.title: ChaoticX 614 - Quests, Minigames, Perfect Switching, Economy & Pk, So Much More!
channel.description:
[center]Hello, this is ChaoticX 614. I hope you're ready to experience the best of the best...
PLAY NOW: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/57415379/ChaoticX%20614%20Client.jar FORUMS AND SITE UNDER CONSTRUCTION, DONE ASAP! [u]Feature list[/u] All Dementhium 614 features (credit to the team) Perfected Farming Working Herblore Construction coming soon? ;) Includes 634 armor and NPCs Vote4Cash PvP and PvM Points system (PvP Points = PK Points, PvM Points = Consolation Points) SafePK for 1 PvP point per kill RiskPK for 4 PvP points per kill 3 - 200 Consolation Points Per NPC killed! Active staff, calm, mature, helpful. Sleek, smooth forums coming soon! Running on a high specs VPS ($120 per month) Anti-DDoS Fully functional report button Plenty more folks, can't ruin the entire surprise can we?
MEDIA: Pictures (PRE-BETA IMAGES) [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1569963/100_Percent_Herb_cleaning.gif[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1569975/Unf_pot_creation.gif[/img]
[img]http://i980.photobucket.com/albums/ae286/ansaf/Potcreation2.gif[/img]
[img]http://www.upload.ee/image/1582345/Harvesting.gif[/img]
MEDIA: Videos (Beta & Pre-Beta Videos) http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=vq8cUWfCcm8
http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=9jG-2XUdC6k
http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=W8nzj0nYxzk
[u]Staff and PRIVATE beta players (thanks guys)[/u]
[b]STAFF[/b]
Owner - Kthxbai Co-Owner CutiePie
Administrator - Red Sh4rk Administrator - Destroy
Moderator - Win All Day Moderator - PK4D A
[b]PRE-BETA PLAYERS[/b]
Crimsonarrow587 Wazxs Metal Raimon Mod Anthony Twiggy Yoda Ftw Jaring David
Be nice to those guys in-game! Maybe tell them thanks! :D
[u][b]Notes[/b]:[/u] 1. We are changing our webhost, forums will be down for approximately 48 hours. 2. The name is a tribute to an old 562, don't say I robbed it. 3. Vote4Cash is temporarily unavailable, will be back ASAP 4. Credit to Dementhium 614 team. 5. We are looking to recruit a Gfx designer! Talk to Kthxbai (myself) or CutiePie to work something out![/center]

item.description:
@redrain995 wrote:

[center]Hello, this is ChaoticX 614. I hope you’re ready to experience the best of the best…

PLAY NOW: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/57415379/ChaoticX%20614%20Client.jar

3 - 200 Consolation Points Per NPC killed!
Active staff, calm, mature, helpful.
